cat.albirar.communications.services

Interface ICommunicationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommunicationServiceImpl

    @Validated
public interface ICommunicationService
    The contract for communications services.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Octavi Fornés <ofornes@albirar.cat>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isStatusMessage(@NotBlank String messageId)
      Check for existence of status message for a message with messageId.
      Optional<MessageStatusBean> popStatusMessage(@NotBlank String messageId)
      Get information about status of message with messageId and delete it.
      String pushMessage(@NotNull @Valid MessageBean message)
      Push a message to dispatch asynchronously.

    • Method Detail

      • popStatusMessage

        Optional<MessageStatusBean> popStatusMessage(@NotBlank
                                             @NotBlank String messageId)
        Get information about status of message with messageId and delete it.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The message id returned by pushMessage(MessageBean) or by #sendMessage(MessageBean)
        Returns:
        The message status or Optional.empty() if no message record exists with the indicated messageId
        Throws:
        ServiceException - On service exceptions errors

      • isStatusMessage

        boolean isStatusMessage(@NotBlank
                        @NotBlank String messageId)
        Check for existence of status message for a message with messageId.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The message id of the associated message
        Returns:
        true if status message exists for associated message with messageId and false if not

      • pushMessage

        String pushMessage(@NotNull @Valid
                   @NotNull @Valid MessageBean message)
        Push a message to dispatch asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send
        Returns:
        The identification of pushed message
        Throws:
        ServiceException - On service exceptions errors
